title: Castles in the Air
description: The same ISBN can be found here with a new cover.BOUND BY THE KING...The document, signed and sealed by King Henry himself, commanded Lady Juliana of Lofts to marry Raymond, Count of Avrache.SHATTERED BY THE PAST...She refused, though it was treason to defy one's king. What man would have her if he knew her secrets?ONE KNIGHT WOULD CRUSADE FOR HIS LADY'S HEART...Yet Raymond would not be denied. And when he came for her, she'd learn that even the strongest will cannot resist the softest touch.
author: Christina Dodd
